DOC.brief_summary: Being parent premature infant NICU anxious state . Parents ask lot question , look information time . Organizing information give parent could reduce anxiety . The parent divide two group : one group get organize information , lecture first week infant 's life , group . Of course , question answer time . The parent answer questionnaire first week infant 's life , last week , release infant home .
DOC.brief_title: Organizing Information Given Parents NICU Infants Order Reduce Their Anxiety

The parent divide two group : one group get organize information , lecture first week infant 's life , group . Of course , question answer time . DOC.criteria: Parents premature infant , release mother Term infant Hospitalized mother
